=Sublime Zen=

==How to install Zen Coding for SublimeText==

  * Look in Download section for ZenCoding.sublime-package file
  * Download the file and double click
  * Restart Sublime.

==Support==

For more info see: http://www.sublimetext.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=580

==Known Issues==
  * Some css triggers starting with @ do not work yet

==Features==

  * As you type expansion/insertion of Zen abbreviations (ctrl+alt+enter)
  * Zen Mnemonic Panel: 2 columns, abbreviations on the left, snips on the right (f1)
  * Tab triggered expansion of Zen abbreviations (abbr, tab)
